ARABIC: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those whose scales are heavy, they are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Only those whose scales are heavier in the balance will find happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It will be an Hour when those whose scales are heavy, they alone will attain success;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If the side of ones good deeds weighs heavier on a scale, he will have everlasting happiness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore the ones whose scales prove heavy – they are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, those whose Scales (of good deeds) are heavy, these! they are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then as for him whose good deeds are preponderant, these are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then he whose scales are heavy -- they are the prosperers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then those whose scales are heavy, they are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then those whose scales weigh heavy with good works will be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he whose balances shall be heavy --these! they are the blissful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then those whose deeds weigh heavy in the scales—it is they who are the felicitous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then those whose balance (of good deeds) is heavy,- they will attain salvation:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, those whose scales (of good deeds) are heavy, - these, they are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those whose scales are heavy shall prosper,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those whose scales are heavy—those are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:102] Then those whose scales are heavy, with good deeds, they are the successful, the winners;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then those whose scales are heavy) with good works, (they are the successful) the ones who will escape Allah's wrath and chastisement.
